root.name: BoBoBo~Bo Bo~BoBo: Hajike Matsuri!
root.description: This game was different to the other Bo-bobo games as instead of the RPG games, this was an on rails action game where the player controls Bo-bobo's nose hairs using the analog sticks to attack any incoming enemies. What makes the game even different is that the camera is facing towards the player as he is walking instead of the back.
